# Engineering Drawings Analyzer Project Setup

## Setup Checklist

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [ ] Clarify Project Requirements
- [ ] Scaffold the Project
- [ ] Customize the Project
- [ ] Install Required Extensions
- [ ] Compile the Project
- [ ] Create and Run Task
- [ ] Launch the Project
- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Project Details
- **Type**: Python application for analyzing engineering drawings using AI vision
- **Main Features**: Load drawings, accept user prompts, use OpenAI GPT-4 Vision API
- **Dependencies**: openai, pillow, python-dotenv
